languages.text: "К оружию, верные! Сегодня мы положим конец тирании!"
"To arms, faithful souls! Their tyranny ends today!"
languages.original_text: "К оружию, верные! Сегодня мы положим конец тирании!"

traits.locale_text: "To arms, faithful souls! Their tyranny ends today!"
"To arms, faithful souls! Their tyranny ends today!"

"To arms, faithful souls! Their tyranny ends today!"

languages.text: «¡A las armas, fieles! ¡Su tiranía acaba hoy!».
languages.original_text: "To arms, faithful souls! Their tyranny ends today!"

traits.locale_text: «¡A las armas, fieles! ¡Su tiranía acaba hoy!».

languages.text: 「忠実なる魂よ、武器を取れ！彼らの暴政は今日終わる！」
languages.original_text: "To arms, faithful souls! Their tyranny ends today!"

traits.locale_text: 「忠実なる魂よ、武器を取れ！彼らの暴政は今日終わる！」

languages.text: “武装起来，忠诚的信徒们！他们的暴政今天就会结束！”
languages.original_text: "To arms, faithful souls! Their tyranny ends today!"

traits.locale_text: “武装起来，忠诚的信徒们！他们的暴政今天就会结束！”

languages.text: "Zu den Waffen, gläubige Seelen! Ihre Tyrannei endet heute!"
languages.original_text: "To arms, faithful souls! Their tyranny ends today!"

traits.locale_text: "Zu den Waffen, gläubige Seelen! Ihre Tyrannei endet heute!"

languages.text: « Aux armes, âmes valeureuses ! Leur tyrannie prend fin aujourd'hui ! »
languages.original_text: "To arms, faithful souls! Their tyranny ends today!"

traits.locale_text: « Aux armes, âmes valeureuses ! Leur tyrannie prend fin aujourd'hui ! »

languages.text: "İnançlı kardeşlerim, silahlarınızı kuşanın! Zorbalıkları bugün sona erecek!"
languages.original_text: "To arms, faithful souls! Their tyranny ends today!"
